column1: Please join me in praying for President Trump and wishing him and the First Lady a healthy recovery. This has been a difficult year for all of us and we pray for the health of all Americans in this fight against COVID-19.

COVID-19 shut down our economy and small businesses across KY. That's why I worked to implement the Paycheck Protection Program which provided forgivable loans to small businesses saved thousands of jobs kept workers on payroll and gave KY small businesses a crucial lifeline. https://t.co/8XMh1Ud2F8

Tune in to Kentucky Educational Television (KET) tonight at 8pm where I will be discussing our work fighting COVID-19 holding China accountable and reopening the economy to begin the Great American Comeback! https://t.co/DEo56KFqoS

Last week I helped secure almost $98 million for Kentucky to develop purchase administer process & analyze COVID-19 tests as well as to expand other virus initiatives. I’m proud to see Kentucky become a leader in the fight to stop this virus once & safely reopen the economy. https://t.co/3RfT3ppIxk

I signed a letter today with 126 other Members of Congress urging @SBAgov to investigate how Planned Parenthood received $80 million through the PPP. Americans deserve to know why COVID-19 relief went to abortion clinics instead of small businesses struggling to stay afloat.

Americans deserve answers to questions about the origins of this pandemic which is why I am grateful to have been appointed to the China Task Force to investigate China’s handling of COVID-19. China’s has destroyed lives & they must be held accountable.  https://t.co/3WgAKzktsm

I was appointed to the House China Task Force to investigate China’s role in COVID-19. This is a matter of national security but Dems are politicizing it. I need you to chip in to my campaign today so I can continue the fight to protect American citizens. https://t.co/teRMyQc6J4 https://t.co/VA2zzwhjM9

Like many businesses Kentucky’s horse racing industry was forced to close because of COVID-19. They were unable to receive PPP loans to keep workers on their payrolls but I worked with the Trump administration to allow for these iconic businesses to be eligible for funding. https://t.co/i6mqiXFcaD

Thank you to all of our nurses on National Nurses Day. You are the heroes in our fight against COVID-19.  It's your work on the frontlines that is saving lives. Together let’s thank these public servants and continue to do our part to help them during this pandemic. https://t.co/ifsoC4jTSi

Like many other businesses Kentucky’s horse racing industry was forced to close due to COVID-19. They were unable to receive PPP loans to keep workers on their payrolls but I worked with the Trump administration to allow for these iconic businesses to be eligible for funding. https://t.co/SWSeewm3Ek
ICYMI: I joined Mario Anderson to provide an update on the federal response to the COVID-19 pandemic. Watch below to learn more:  https://t.co/f7pco2tieW

It's critical we get to the bottom of what happened in China with the coronavirus. I'm fighting to establish a bipartisan investigative committee with members from both parties in the House and Senate. We must work together to keep our country safe and hold China accountable. https://t.co/Ax9f2lJ3fK

Joe Biden reportedly said he was excited about the opportunity for “institutional changes” because of the coronavirus. This isn't any different from what extremists like AOC have said about their chances to advance their agenda because of the virus. We cannot let them do this! https://t.co/aW5DTGnUSa

Andy Barr is leading the fight to create a bipartisan commission to investigate Chinas mishandling and coverup of the coronavirus.  Sign up here if you support holding China accountable: https://t.co/9Aw7MMw4em https://t.co/azz6434QyR

President Trump was 100% right to call out WHO for their response to COVID-19. When the Chinese government started their coverup of the outbreak WHO cooperated. The US needs to defund the organization and launch an investigation. https://t.co/O3dogiqFfy

Kentucky’s motto “United We Stand Divided We Fall” has never rung truer than right now. Despite fearmongers’ attempts to cowe and divide us we’re standing strong and standing together against COVID-19. Take courage - we will emerge victorious!

China lied & people died:  -Covered-up the Coronavirus -Destroyed medical evidence -Jailed doctors to keep them quiet -Lied to the world -Hoarded PPE  Instead of another Pelosi witch-hunt Congress needs to investigate China and hold them accountable for their disastrous actions.

Reminder: due to COVID-19 the April 15 tax filing deadline has extended to July 15. Taxpayers and businesses in Kentucky now have more time to file returns and make federal AND state tax payments without interest or penalties. Learn more by clicking here: https://t.co/ZqZDRpgglC

I have tremendous gratitude for all the volunteers and manufacturers across Kentucky who are stepping up to create personal protection equipment. RT to thank our amazing small businesses & community organizations stepping up in the fight against #COVID19. https://t.co/66BWLuq2TN

Though Kentucians have worked hard to flatten the curve the fight is still far from over. Please continue to practice safe social distancing avoid large gatherings & only leave your home for essential errands. Together we'll beat #COVID19 & come out stronger than ever before. https://t.co/6yK1Da9D9Q

The #CARESAct passed by Congress & signed into law by @realdonaldtrump provides relief for American families & small businesses & billions for life-saving equipment. Together we'll help keep workers on payroll & ensure our healthcare workers have the resources to fight COVID19. https://t.co/6XtBYFh4fn

Dr. Mark Newman his team of healthcare workers and all of our first responders and medical workers are heroes as they serve on the frontlines in our fight against #COVID19. We are grateful for their efforts and I will continue to advocate for them. https://t.co/no04MaFH49
ICYMI: I went on WKYT to provide an update on some of the work we're doing in Congress to help with our fight against COVID:19. https://t.co/p0knqVQD4m

Our healthcare workers and facilities are on the front lines in our fight against the COVID-19. Ensuring they have the protection they need is crucial and I am grateful these additional supplies of personal protective equipment are en route to Kentucky.  https://t.co/PlfhjzAC13
Join me in praying for the family of this Bourbon County resident. Together we as community must do what we can to stop the spread of coronavirus in Kentucky.  https://t.co/kMeEXXNEAB

Every level of government has mobilized to fight the Coronavirus and keep Americans safe. From @VP's strong leadership overseeing the federal response Congress quickly passing a bipartisan bill to support the CDC and other government agencies we are united in this fight. https://t.co/ZoSNCKbx4e
